title: The Introspective Debate of Owen Brody
description: Brody was 95 percent sure he was not gay.That is, until he met Linden, who is funny, intelligent, has a lip ring thing that chicks drop trow for....and kissed him.The truth of the matter was, that in that moment, Brody was 60 percent sure he was not gay.Status: CompleteWord count: approx. 39,346
author: Dart Gray
